Class HotelInitialiser

java.lang.Object
HotelInitialiser
public abstract class HotelInitialiser extends Object
The HotelInitialiser class reads hotel and room data from a specified file, creates appropriate Hotel and TypeOfRoom objects and stores them in a list to be further processed later on.
Author:
Edison Cai 20241135

  • Method Details

    • getFileCells

      public static ArrayList<String[]> getFileCells(String fileName)
      This method splits every line of the hotel details into cells of Strings.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the csv file containing hotel and rooms details.
      Returns:
      A list of lines that were in the file specified by fileName. Each line is represented as an array of Strings, each representing a value of the hotel/room.

    • getRates

      private static double[] getRates(String[] rates)

    • initialise

      public static void initialise(ArrayList<String[]> cells)
      Initialises all the Hotels with all their rooms and places them in an ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      cells - A list of lines represented as String arrays containing all hotel and room details and values.

    • getAllHotels

      public static ArrayList<Hotel> getAllHotels()
      Get list of all hotels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all Hotels found in the hotels csv.

    • getAllRooms

      public static ArrayList<TypeOfRoom> getAllRooms()
      Returns all types of rooms that the booker can choose.
      Returns:
      All types of rooms that the booker can choose.

    • getHotel

      public static Hotel getHotel(String hotelName)
      Returns the Hotel object from the name specified.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - The name of the hotel in String form.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Hotel object extracted from the list of all hotels.
